mapper.sql: t.COMPANY_DISTRIBUTE_ID, t.ORDER_DETAIL_ID, t.DIS_TIME, t.DIS_COUNT, t.DISTRIBUTE_ID, t.RESPONSE_STATE, t.RESPONSE_INFO, t.RESPONSE_TIME, t.CHECK_RESULT
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MIDDLE_DISTRIBUTE( COMPANY_DISTRIBUTE_ID , ORDER_DETAIL_ID , DIS_TIME , DIS_COUNT , DISTRIBUTE_ID , RESPONSE_STATE , RESPONSE_INFO , RESPONSE_TIME , CHECK_RESULT ) VALUES ( #{companyDistributeId} , #{orderDetailId} , #{disTime} , #{disCount} , #{distributeId} , #{responseState} , #{responseInfo} , #{responseTime} , #{checkResult} )

INSERT INTO MIDDLE_DISTRIBUTE ( COMPANY_DISTRIBUTE_ID , ORDER_DETAIL_ID , DIS_TIME , DIS_COUNT , DISTRIBUTE_ID , RESPONSE_STATE , RESPONSE_INFO , RESPONSE_TIME , CHECK_RESULT ) VALUES
( #{item.companyDistributeId}, #{item.orderDetailId}, #{item.disTime}, #{item.disCount}, #{item.distributeId}, #{item.responseState}, #{item.responseInfo}, #{item.responseTime}, #{item.checkResult} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE MIDDLE_DISTRIBUTE
ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{orderDetailId},
DIS_TIME = #{disTime},
DIS_COUNT = #{disCount},
DISTRIBUTE_ID = #{distributeId},
RESPONSE_STATE = #{responseState},
RESPONSE_INFO = #{responseInfo},
RESPONSE_TIME = #{responseTime},
CHECK_RESULT = #{checkResult},
WHERE COMPANY_DISTRIBUTE_ID = #{companyDistributeId}

UPDATE MIDDLE_DISTRIBUTE t
ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{model.orderDetailId},
DIS_TIME = #{model.disTime},
DIS_COUNT = #{model.disCount},
DISTRIBUTE_ID = #{model.distributeId},
RESPONSE_STATE = #{model.responseState},
RESPONSE_INFO = #{model.responseInfo},
RESPONSE_TIME = #{model.responseTime},
CHECK_RESULT = #{model.checkResult},
